SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Trade Hub relative to Port of Aethelgard?
SRP.A: Meridian Trade Hub is {below} Port of Aethelgard in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Trade Hub}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Shipping Co.}.

NC.Q: Was the total Agricultural Exports in 1969 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total agricultural exports in 1969 was {lower} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Agricultural Exports in 1977 higher or lower than in 1978?
NC.A: The total agricultural exports in 1977 was {higher} than in 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1972, was the average total Agricultural Exports higher or lower than between 1968 and 1978?

NC.A: The total agricultural exports in 1967 was {higher} than in 1969.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Port of Aethelgard, Borealis Shipping Co., Meridian Trade Hub}.
